mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO USER( NICKNAME, NAME, GENDER, JOB, PHONENUMBER, EMAIL, PASSWORD, ROLE
) VALUE ( #{nickname}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{job}, #{phonenumber}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , NICKNAME , PASSWORD , NAME , PHONENUMBER , EMAIL , GENDER , JOB , ROLE , INTRODUCTION , SITE_URL , REGDATE , MODDATE FROM USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
